DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: European Car Sales Increase : Sales during the first_half of the year rose 6.6 % from a year earlier , when the industry hit its lowest point of the recession , the European car_makers association said . First-half sales in Western Europe rose to 6 # 489 , 400 cars , and June sales jumped 11.8 % from a year earlier to 1 # 054 , 800 vehicles , the second straight sharp monthly rise .
